title: Add dotnet tests to a project
description: Adds a dotnet test project to an existing Nx project. The type of test project can be mstest, nunit, or xunit and is specified by the `testType` option which corresponds to test template values used in the `dotnet new` command.

examples.description: Create a dotnet mstest project with a test prefix
Create a dotnet 7.0 xunit project with a test prefix

project.x-prompt: What project should tests be added to?

frameworkVersion.description: The .Net Framework version to use. Valid options are either `latest` or `LTS`.

testPrefix.description: An optional prefix to give the tests. Ex: `integration` for `IntegrationTests`
